resources.string: title suujishi in japanese means number master in English.
Open your browser and go to the quest page.
change number of rows and columns to 3 and shuffle
change number of rows and columns to 6 and shuffle
change number of rows and columns to 9 and shuffle
Where do you tap to start? Please guess.
please enter the start number in input menu
Which one do you want to copy?
Are you sure you want to delete this complete data?
"If you press the button, the game you are playing will be rewritten to what you have entered."

"There are 3 steps 1. Return the numbers to their natural order. 2. Maximize the score. 3. Master the new high-dimensional play.
There are 1 way 1. Slide the number into the empty frame.
If you want more fun, try the quest."

"① Vacant place Calculated at 9
② If you change the size, the current situation will be shuffled.
③ Press start to "start". "Start" means that the timer will run, you will be able to move the number board, and you will not be able to press the buttons.
Press stop to "pause". "Pause" is the opposite of "start". In addition, the game is save. Once the game is saved, you can restart the game even if you close app.
④ "Finish" is to finish the game. The order at the start, the order at the finish, and the status are saved in the ranking. Then the timer and score become 0. You can start a new game.
Proceed to use after maximizing the score.
⑤ Can be used after maximizing the score."

" People were close to the environment when they asked if they would gain intelligence or not. The environment is everything from races to the earth and space. At that time, people knew that manipulating numbers would cause a mysterious phenomenon, not intellectually but empirically.
Over time, in the ancient Greek era, he created a magic square in the world of mathematics in an attempt to preserve it. However, because of the emphasis on leaving it, it has become a thing that is not close to the environment at all, just to match the total of vertical, horizontal and diagonal.
And although it is gradually returning to its original form in modern times, such as weather forecasts and virtual reality, it is still far from being completed.
A number master, who instinctively knows the original numbers. You may just not be awake. Discard the conceptual numbers and wake up to the real numbers."

This game is sliding puzzle. However, you are free to decide where to start and in which direction. Also, if all of the vertical total, horizontal total, and diagonal total match, the score will be higher.

"1. The search function has been released on the ranking screen.
2. The secret button has changed to a cube mode button on the game screen.
※ Now, if you achieve more counter stops, something will happen in you."
